data.name: HMM Founder's Pack - Gold Edition
data.detailed_description:
In the Golden Founder’s pack, you will have a great array of goodies for your characters in game! All players that purchase this pack will have the bragging rights to an awesome character layout. Included in this pack, players will receive 1 (one) Metal Legend, Rockstar, and Idol skin for all current characters as well as all future characters that are released in the game – forever.

Along with some rad skins for the characters, the characters themselves are also included, so no extra steps are needed to have all the characters.

We’re adding a 10% extra XP bonus, for all your matches at the end of every game. This will extend to everyone who plays with you, and it stacks! If all 8 players in the game have this founder’s pack, everyone will receive 80% bonus XP for that match. [This will be implemented by the end of March].

As if that weren’t enough, your avatar will be personalized with a custom border so everyone will know how awesome you are!

The Metal Legend Skins included in this pack will not be sold anywhere after the game is released, so getting this founder’s pack is a great investment in your characters look – and the only way to secure Metal Legend Skins for characters released after the launch.

Along with all of this, you will gain our exclusive digital soundtrack from Heavy Metal Machines to jam out to when you aren’t playing!

To sum it up, this pack includes:
  • All current and future characters.
  • A Metal Legend, Rockstar and Idol level skins for all those characters.
  • The Metal Legend Skin above will only be sold inside the game store for the characters released during the beta. Therefore, this pack is the only way of having Metal Legend skins for post-launch characters.
  • 10% Bonus XP for all your matches - forever.
  • Personalized avatar border to set you apart.
  • Digital Heavy Metal Machines soundtrack.

And so you know, these are the Skins that are included in this pack:
  • Metal Legend Skin for all characters, forever.
  • The Pain Train
  • Journey to Rupture
  • We Hate the Sand
  • Underhanded Star
  • Metal Judgement
  • Cosa Nostra
  • Unleash the Horns
  • Father’s Heritage
  • Rust in Pieces
  • Race to Jokstruction
  • Get Sunny
  • No prayer for the Crying
  • Eternal Road
  • Enemy of Bosses
  • Back and Beyond
  • Road to Hunt
  • Stream That
  • The Blightocaust
  • Got Fired
  • Vengeful Spirit
  • Run. Trample. Repeat.
  • Stars and Glory
  • Ride to Joke, Joke to Ride
  • Quicker, Better, Faster, Sunner
  • Temple of Blood
  • Plus one Idol and one Rockstar level Skins for all future characters, forever.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics HD 4000 or Nvidia GT 620
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 2.3+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 or Radeon HD 6770
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
